# Mockoon

> Mockoon is the easiest and fastest way to design and run mock REST APIs. No remote deployment, no account required, free and open source.

## About Mockoon

Mockoon is a powerful API mocking tool available as:
- **Desktop application** for Windows, macOS, and Linux
- **CLI** for automation and CI/CD integration
- **Docker image** for self-hosting and containerized environments

## Mockoon Cloud

Mockoon Cloud is our premium offering that provides:
- **Real-time collaboration** for teams
- **Cloud deployments** of your mock APIs
- **Enhanced features** for professional use like a web interface, advanced logging and team management

We are an independent open-source project, not venture capital backed. We finance our work on the open-source tools through sponsorships and Mockoon Cloud subscriptions.

## Resources

- **Website**: https://mockoon.com
- **Documentation**: https://mockoon.com/docs/latest/about/
- **Tutorials**: https://mockoon.com/tutorials/
- **Releases**: https://mockoon.com/releases/
- **Download**: https://mockoon.com/download/
